content: note i did not turn rnds when crocheting the sleeves as the eyelash yarn obscures right and wrong sides however you may wish to turn rnds if using a sport weight or baby yarn instructions with i hook chain 20 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet skip next chain * v skip next chain repeat from * ending with double_crochet in each of the last 2 chs chain 3 turn counts as 1st double_crochet of next row row 2 - 6 double_crochet v in each v s chain-1 space across row ending with 2 double_crochet chain 3 turn note do not chain 3 at end of row 6 join that narrow side of your work by working a slip_stitch in the corresponding end st to form armhole you will now be working rnds to form the sleeves sleeve round 1 chain 4 double_crochet in same space 1st v made work 5 more v stitches evenly around armhole join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-4 6 v stitches repeat round 1 three times 4 rnds total shell trim chain 1 single_crochet in same space * 3 double_crochet in next v single_crochet in next v repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten yarn attach yarn in other end of rectangle and join with slip_stitch in the corresponding end st to form other armhole work as for 1st sleeve shrug body ruffle attach yarn at one underarm chain 4 double_crochet in same space work 22 v stitches evenly around shrug body for a total of 23 v stitches join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-4 fasten yarn weave in yarn ends © 2006 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern
